alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:10PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kootenai County through 145 PM PDT... At 110 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coeur d`Alene, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coeur d`Alene, Post Falls, and Huetter. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 8 and 12. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 422 and 431. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
